title: Chows Asian Bistro
typeOfFood: Ovo, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Many dishes on menu can be adapted to special dietary requirements. Staff is aware of veg options for each dish and can make suggestions. Atmosphere is a of small Asian art gallery with many artifacts brought back from China by the owner. Dishes from China as well as other parts of Asia are featured, but customers are free to invent their own dish.
